name: Lucky Lefty Loves Lucid Dreaming
description:
Lucky lefty lunges through loops while levitating in lucid dreams. Lookout, sometimes Lucky lefty looses latitude  although loops can still be landed. How fast can you make it through the loops?

This was made for HonestJam3 with the theme Dream.

Controls:
WASD, Arrow Keys, or Gamepad Left Joystick for movement
Alternative mouse click movement (in options)
R to reset
O for options (or click the icon in top right)

Art: ElysiaGriffin
Code: TheBookSnail
